feed.title: Prowlarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.24.3.4754
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 17e1a72baf2b547e5944e04434af1c1895391f4f Bump webpack to 5.94.0 and regenerate yarn.lock
  • b454ded00ac0a857fff0bab004a5e276361b165a Bump version to 1.24.3
  • d4512393e212f57f4534a41d0ec836a76af18a69 Automated API Docs update
  • 97d1384726a2c114fc2f5e688a222604f1caa245 Guard against using invalid sort keys
  • ba002a7a4af8ae8bd2413f0aa3d2e4ddb1c3f358 Add packages needed for RemoveDiacritics
  • 349efab7a818a49f576813797d648cc86c9ec077 Fix description for API key as query parameter
  • af9a6f42db9dbb305aa8c445b6e1bb340a4791ad Fixed: Unable to login when instance name contained brackets
  • 6b20fa8abdaf8a43d4e8f0e1471469219495563c New: Use instance name in forms authentication cookie name [ #2224 ]
  • 029ad3903f0074dabdc585a9dcae8d7dd37fa4a7 Bump version to 1.24.2
  • a23d66930b01c76c982e1655c83a1a7f37dc95d7 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
See More * 710ab7ae090b2bb0a86dde08aa830595b2ea8bcc New: (Gazelle/OPS/RED) Prevent downloads without FL tokens * 434b07ae648d04088ada30c6853680831e3cc04b New: Sync seeding limits for LazyLibrarian (#2215) * eee8c95ca66f84f3cd2cc5c0f28654a7f1395e14 Fix weblate widget * 1f5c5140118d94eaf2d7a0b1c7ce0e2edd953a6f Bump version to 1.24.1 * 66d722e0970754c64418735c498c5f968d657073 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 39befe5aa4f409cbc4d237bd7a657aaa21fc1af7 Use error message from Nebulance response [ #2212 ] * ab043e87dc13e693cecbe4a02c82e825cf85a9a1 Display grabs, failures and queries stats with values * 58ae9c0a13daa5c72cd46e7257e801c68481f590 Fixed: (MyAnonamouse) Avoid using FL wedges for freeleech torrents * 44c446943c4f4c75a3dac65d05be515d5cdc2395 Fixed: (Gazelle) Allow freeleech torrents with Use Freeleech Tokens * 8301b669fe3ce43a5930476422535e3f98f27f59 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 6fa0b79c673c15d23afff1c8003c438c54582752 Bump version to 1.24.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=145&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.25.4.4818
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 3f547f08567d07b29939e56ff231ed2d3d715348 Cleanse exceptions in event logs

  • 2afafd79e423c2b7b38eab2ccf861cacf2c84f3e Fixed: Don't block updates under docker unless configured in package_info
  • f4fa2517d2d389633f72d991ac581935d3dc6204 Sort indexers by name when syncing to applications
  • 37bc46c1cd664121733e3b1e663176871469b02b Translate System pages
  • 3e3a7ed4f0a0197a366c188549f57f25d71a686a Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
See More * 04fa7d366dd4fd849a420729d1c27525e35bde2e Fixed: (Cardigann) Redirect warnings with "Refresh" header * ed9a3214a216743752de917b1afe31e6dbb85c59 Fix redirect url in HttpClient development warning message * 66a9e1a653701a48e51867c927a17c3b307b695a Bump dotnet to 6.0.35 * 8cb59c35fbc76db1b3b9f713041e77c512b03c8a New: Sync UI updates for providers * 94e9c05d60b93ff39588fd6a2c360fe87e34cd3e Natural sorting for tags list in the UI * 8d2c4e12465c854b0dcca6c19017ed2003b0a918 Bump version to 1.25.3 * c05be39346b017d6ef228fddaefd9d3c24c8493d Treat unauthorized newbie accounts in AvistaZ parser * 951d42a591f22c977a12599ebed00d728fd0e737 Fix indexer url info * dd046d8a684bcae3ea3a09ab8fba031cea3e2c45 Fixed: (Cardigann) Validate definition file and setting fields existence [ #2245 ] * efa54a4d51d0a439e6871884ea9bbb17b487bea1 Remove unused gulp packages * 3f07c50cc5201c9b7fb034ecae662e5734cf0dca Fixed: Copy to clipboard in non-secure contexts * 94cf07ddb48a8fd41a30d19debc1096ebdff8efd Convert ClipboardButton to TypeScript * 24063e06abff7aca36dca1b90f271294a22624c9 Convert FormInputButton to TypeScript * e8ebb871898c7845fc2eb6bb86bfe53dc76377ea Convert Label to TypeScript * 896e196767266c13b4d304d9c50a77a6e57af17a Convert Button to TypeScript * 9f5be75e6d105478f7f6003a7f14de95c9be8603 Link polymorphic static typing * 9cc9e720bb72ec5d40ea34c163885747919ba5a0 Bump frontend packages * a9c2cca66d8c2a1c9031adf8c02fa2ead19973bb Bump dotnet packages * 9cc3646be5deef013b70c31e09931598e8621a31 Fixed: (Cardigann) Using variables in login paths * d6bca449da50879218089a8baa3c13fdc0793d75 Cleanse sharewood passkey * cb5764c654a70e9eea092d6b9aa55990c0e598cb Log exceptions when getting indexer definitions [ #2245 ] * 19a9b56fa465e232c536dca58742a2602cc55b93 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * a2b0f199f15d12018047190d689349f15187b5e7 Fixed: (BeyondHD) Filter freeleech or limited releases when configured * 59bfad7614dec17b8907d02a31deaa3604e55140 New: Use 307 redirect for requests missing URL Base * aee3f2d12b4db04c19513afec655b5ebce0c16dc Fixed: Handle 307 redirects from applications * 11d58b4460e5debd5a08512021bcdd0d0b115deb Bump macOS runner version to 13 * ee4de6c6cac76f0ac0c20f16ee9e095ebbf7fe1f Bump version to 1.25.2 * 8d16b8818532e5d40567cbfe8568b814127a7c92 Return bad request for unprotect download link failures * 121ef8e80d010507f3c5f5aae7c7bbf2c03fb76a Add new category for FL * d53fec7e756293220dc92acfacdc4af680a7eefb Add newbie warning for AvistaZ's API use * c017a3cd7eaefac38ff56c4174904d2dc1f3e830 New: (PTP) Filter by Golden Popcorn only releases * 27ea93090f8484ba4c277a032dc3a2f659ad8d60 Use proxied requests for fetching user class for MAM * d79845144e0f04fe756944d8d9acb7d1e44bf749 Bump version to 1.25.1 * 3f77900dd020fd2ec8c46a679cdee9ca836e4f19 Automated API Docs update * 4e8b9e81cfb7c199037f03d683289f4742042bde New: Option to prefer magnet URLs over torrent file links * a32ab3acfd3fb7a4d0ccb13432ff65563b1a808c Fixed: (AnimeBytes) Avoid specials for non-zero season searches * 942da3a5c0db615a3ab38dcbed839166003fc006 Bump version to 1.25.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=150&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.26.1.4844
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • a9b93df0c9a0e0f1cd24316e131c74f9cd116364 Pin ReportGenerator in Azure Pipelines for .NET 6
  • 2726787ee97cb0cc04460afde15ca119824fecf6 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

  • 06ae85e6d175e6751b545a42ab5c76ebc6dff1c0 Fixed: Updates Page Translations
  • b1c7e986644c93306712de71ae4906d6bef37579 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 62479737a70685d09fb9b38e419ff4960c35903b Fixed: (Torrent RSS) Clear old cookies on edit [ #2275 ]
  • 8e69415d64b14b1af2e45f347bfa4db35f8d2ba4 Check for disabled till value in filtering blocked providers
  • 222dfb182126741301e0764b158d0d67ab5483ee Bump version to 1.26.1
  • 94f439e238c68d768cb2cbceed1a1fef4af7ba46 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 903a88c1213541a613ea36eee7223679dc8034b5 Update timezone offset for FL
See More * 9690ab68837291d723a66ad60da03c4d6df0392e Fixed: (IPTorrents) Search IMDb ID in descriptions * 1e1a2b3b4aaeb77027f17ed895967790ed5588ae Fixed: (BeyondHD) Enforce length for API and RSS keys * 9dc2d3669c8af1eaab2876c0ce9ebd569a2de874 Fixed: NzbIndex removed, API not supported * 511c76e219bde3ac0baa841b3469c9f2a45fb3c2 Update JetBrains logos * 78329b7b9224bd427fd0e9b5e5378b53d57b06bc Improve exception message for invalid torrent files * 424004885371d03f60828c0e0ff461c548dccc7e Add Knaben as native indexer * 432af42ffdba12313c2ed017ed3fd29a3f24ed12 Fixed indexer names for no definitions check * 0d6c03f8d4b036b4744375d41dcf5cfb26edcf4f Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 96830f975e82593d98087c6e60227034ff6d6d7e Cleaning paths for top level root folders * 13c538ff58ac93f3a116af12ecb965c841c8443f Ignore extra spaces in path when not running on Windows * 14250e9634a7c006d160a8c3067dfd5c54aa37ea Fixed getting parents from different OS paths * e2f7890d76605b2005f6d125419ca38113f0958c Use `OperatingSystem` class to get OS information * 257d38de669a780471a41c7f65e36d64955e4ac0 Inherit trigger from pushed command models * fd2a14e01b16ee47083822c23b73f3a36dd7f144 Fix settings fetching failure for updates * b4d76c713835cc8cac6b7b7471e4b68a5d52957e Fixed: Initial state for qBittorrent v5.0 * 9655f37fa8e138d6b0f46676d1196877174fadd7 Trim directory separators in GetRelativePath * 246fb9b8553bec4e7727b83a2a77ad6a95f15c11 Update check returns error if build older than 180 days * 25afadc9b2e5e20539bddebea904aab72a36f5d1 Bump version to 1.26.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=154&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.28.2.4885
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.
